voicesplitting.gui

Class NoteDisplayerWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.SwingWorker<NoteDisplayer,java.lang.Void>
      • voicesplitting.gui.NoteDisplayerWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<NoteDisplayer>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<NoteDisplayer>

    public class NoteDisplayerWorker
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker<NoteDisplayer,java.lang.Void>
    A NoteDisplayerWorker does the work of updating the NoteDisplayer GUI in the background.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 20 June, 2015

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected NoteDisplayer doInBackground()
      Do the main work of loading the MidiNotes into a new NoteDisplayer and return it.
